Posts.Content: Can anyone out there tell me how they cope with hot flushes during the night????? I seem to be spendin MOST of my time in bed fighting with the duvet....I sleep on the window side of the bed with the window oopen most of the time....Shaun my partner is great and doesn't comment very much about my nightime activity but I'm sure I must disturb him. During the day I can cope with them as I can walk around and even go out side when I am at work.....But the nights are becoming sometimes quite difficult as I am loosing quite a lot of sleep as well. I thought they had all but stopped prior to the chemo but now I am on my 4th of 6 they seem to have gained momentum at a fair pace!....sometime every hour.... Apart from sleeping in the bath......any suggestions. Jan.
